q: Rep. Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room. The aide shouted back that the room was open-- and overflowing. Congress had just passed the stimulus(

It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a`` tremendous leader'' whose contributions exceeded all expectations.`` There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done,'' Page said.

Sinitta added that Simon Cowell had only recently accepted the fact that he wouldn't be able to judge both shows. People have said he'll fly backwards and forwards and do both. But he's not just a judge, he's also a mentor. That means he needs to stay in just one place. It's possible Simon Cowell will miss the UK version for a year and come back once the US one is settled in. Steve Jones is in the running to land the presenting gig on the US show ahead of Dermot O'Leary , who has made no secret of his desire to move Stateside.
